publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-2601.1# Murdo Fraser: City of Perth—As an amendment to motion (S2M-2601) in the name of Roseanna Cunningham, insert at end "but regrets that Perth is not recognised as having legal city status by the Scottish Executive and accordingly considers that the Executive should accept Perth as having city status on a par with Aberdeen, Dundee, Edinburgh, Glasgow, Inverness and Stirling."

S2M-2601.1# Murdo Fraser: City of Perth—As an amendment to motion (S2M-2601) in the name of Roseanna Cunningham, insert at end "but regrets that Perth is not recognised as having legal city status by the Scottish Executive and accordingly considers that the Executive should accept Perth as having city status on a par with Aberdeen, Dundee, Edinburgh, Glasgow, Inverness and Stirling."
